name: PowerJack
description:
Pure Adrenaline Non-Stop
PowerJack is all about high-octane, intense, non-stop action.  Just pick up a gun and seed as much havoc as you possibly can.

Game Modes

  • Team Death Match - pair up with a brother in arms and race the enemy team to 20 kills
  • Survival - If you want to feel like an unstoppable killing machine, this is the game mode for you. Endless waves of enemies have one purpose - to make your career as short as possible. How many can you flatten before you're toast?
  • Intel - Capture the enemy team's intel and bring it back to your base. Sounds easy enough, right? Think again - the enemies will show no mercy

Weapons

PowerJack is all about carnage, and that means tons of weapons. We won't spoil it here, instead we'll just say - there's an entire arsenal to be explored. Shoot, maim, fry and explode your way to glory.
